name: Wishbird Experiences SAPI de CV.
description: Developer of an online marketplace designed to offer gift items to the people. The company's online marketplace offers activity gifts online like diving, paragliding, rafting, hot air balloon flights, exclusive spas and many more for women and men, enabling clients to increase engagement and loyalty with their stakeholders.
one_liner: Developer of an online marketplace designed to offer gift items to the people. The company's online marketplace offers activity gifts online like diving, paragliding, rafting, hot air balloon flights, exclusive spas and many more for women and men, enabling clients to increase engagement and loyalty with their stakeholders.
